name: Terra Omega
storyline:
They came without warning and took the Earth for their own.
Only your team of guerrilla insurgents stands between the alien hordes and the absolute end of humanity.
Will you be able to take back the planet, or is it really Terra Omega?
summary:
Control your team of specialists and outthink, outmaneuver and outflank the enemy.
Synergize your special abilities to control the battle field and dominate your foes.
Use cover to your advantage to hide from the enemy and draw them into your lines of fire.
